main event: Multiple witnesses observed a bright unidentified aerial object in Elizabethtown, Pennsylvania, on February 23, which they described as a meteor.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 15-20 seconds by multiple witnesses., The object was described as traveling at a speed faster than conventional aircraft., Witnesses included a foreman, housewife, and a store owner., The object was reported to be orange-blue in color and without sound., The sighting occurred in clear weather conditions with broken clouds.
sighted object: an object described as a meteor
witness description: A foreman, a housewife, and a store owner from Elizabethtown.
